short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slack to Crack is a simple Chrome extension that turns all references to the word `Slack` in your web browser to `Crack`.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Specific text changes:
Slack ➡ Crack
SlackHQ ➡ Crackhouse
Slackbot ➡ Crackbot

Slack to Crack is case sensitive.
